name: vue-date-input
description: An easy masked date input field which works on all browsers. No need for those user unfriendly date pickers anymore.
author: Pascal van Gemert <pascal@pascalvangemert.nl>

scripts.build: npm run build:unpkg & npm run build:es & npm run build:umd
scripts.build:umd: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format umd --file dist/vue-simple-validator.umd.js
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format es --file dist/vue-simple-validator.esm.js
scripts.build:unpkg: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format iife --file dist/vue-simple-validator.min.js
